Kirby.name: Kirby
Kirby.description: A well-rounded rider with steady handling and reliable performance in any situation.

King Dedede.name: King Dedede
King Dedede.description: Heavy and powerful with strong offense and high durability, but sluggish acceleration and handling.

Meta Knight.name: Meta Knight
Meta Knight.description: A fast aerial expert with excellent lift and flight speed, balanced by low charge power.

Waddle Dee.name: Waddle Dee
Waddle Dee.description: A surprisingly peppy rider with huge boost and grip, but weak offense and flight control.

Bandana Waddle Dee.name: Bandana Waddle Dee
Bandana Waddle Dee.description: A brave fighter with strong control and turning, though weak in flight and speed.

Waddle Doo.name: Waddle Doo
Waddle Doo.description: High charge and boost power make this rider explosive, but overall technique is unstable.

Chef Kawasaki.name: Chef Kawasaki
Chef Kawasaki.description: A sturdy heavyweight with high flight power and HP, though lacking in handling finesse.

Knuckle Joe.name: Knuckle Joe
Knuckle Joe.description: A speedy brawler with strong offense and charge stats but limited lift and weight.

Rick.name: Rick
Rick.description: A durable rider with solid offense and HP, though his flight stats hold him back.

Gooey.name: Gooey
Gooey.description: Very high grip and lift make Gooey sticky and floaty, but his mobility is mediocre.

Cappy.name: Cappy
Cappy.description: Great turning and boost power make Cappy swift in tight spaces, though fragile overall.

Rocky.name: Rocky
Rocky.description: Extremely tough with huge HP and weight, but very low charge and handling.

Scarfy.name: Scarfy
Scarfy.description: High charge and turning make Scarfy agile, but very low weight makes it easy to knock around.

Starman.name: Starman
Starman.description: An excellent turning and flight rider with strong boost, but very low weight and durability.

Lololo & Lalala.name: Lololo & Lalala
Lololo & Lalala.description: A duo with impressive offense and HP, balanced with modest boost and turning.

Marx.name: Marx
Marx.description: A tricky flier with good lift and offense, though fragile and weak in HP.

Daroach.name: Daroach
Daroach.description: A nimble thief with fast offense and turning, but light and easy to push around.

Magolor.name: Magolor
Magolor.description: A technical rider with great lift and HP, but low grip and turning make him tricky to use.

Taranza.name: Taranza
Taranza.description: Excellent offense and HP with strong flight, though weighed down by weak turning and grip.

Susie.name: Susie
Susie.description: A speedy tech rider with high flight and HP, but weak boost and low turning.

Noir Dedede.name: Noir Dedede
Noir Dedede.description: A darker, faster Dedede variant with higher offense and flight, but reduced stability.
